Uses of Class
nzilbb.ag.util.ConventionTransformer

  • Packages that use ConventionTransformer 
    Package Description
    nzilbb.ag.util
    Utility classes for processing annotation graphs.

    • Uses of ConventionTransformer in nzilbb.ag.util

      Methods in nzilbb.ag.util that return ConventionTransformer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ConventionTransformer ConventionTransformer.addDestinationResult​(String layerId, String label)
      Add a destination result to destinationResults.
      ConventionTransformer ConventionTransformer.setDestinationResults​(HashMap<String,​String> newDestinationResults)
      Setter for destinationResults: A map of layer IDs to label values which may include references to groups captured in the sourcePattern.
      ConventionTransformer ConventionTransformer.setSourceLayerId​(String newSourceLayerId)
      Setter for sourceLayerId: Layer ID of the annotations to transform.
      ConventionTransformer ConventionTransformer.setSourcePattern​(String newSourcePattern)
      Setter for sourcePattern: Regular expression in the source layer which triggers transformation of the annotation.
